## 1. Purpose

## 2. Prerequisites
* Technician must be logged into a management workstation (e.g., CLIENT01).
* Technician must have RSAT installed.
* **Safety Check:** This procedure applies to **Standard Users only**. If the request is for an Admin/VIP, refer to SOP-009 (Escalations).
